I haven't downloaded this torrent, as I found version 1.7 (also cracked by AiR) elsewhere. It's a great synth. It's been superseded by ReFX's Nexus ROMpler, but if you want a quick way into making trance/electro sounds, with a much smaller download, this is a great VSTi. You can also get some excellent preset soundbanks from KVR.

yar, how do i get this to work on fruityloops tried n tried n tried wont work.. erm can someone tell me how to do it from start? thank you.

well, unpack the file until you've extracted an setup.exe file..Run the install...Then copy the unpacked data into the Image Line/FL Studio ?/Plugins directory

The ? stands for the version you have, I have 7, so the folder is named FL Studio 7

Then, open fruity loops, then head for Channels/Add one/More..
Then click "Refresh" and then Vanguard should be on the bottom of the list in red..

Then select one of the four default samples, and use the right-mouse button to gain access to "Insert" and then Vanguard should be in the bottom of the list..Then just click on in and you're in!:)
